attributes.action: Have the Budget Speech vetted by an Independant authority prior to it being read out in the commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The budget speech should be vetted for misleading and ambiguous comments as well as omisions so that the people of the United Kingdom get told the truth and are not misled. The chancellor should also report on a full range of pre-set statistics so that he cannot leave out the bad bits. And if he should mislead the house or miss out any vital points he should be sacked!
